description: This file defines a function 'buildSrcDoc' that creates a complete HTML document string suitable for use as an iframe srcdoc. It combines user-provided HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, embeds security policies, installs console and error capture mechanisms, and executes user scripts safely.

methods.name: buildSrcDoc({ html, css, js, channelId })
methods.description: Constructs an HTML string with embedded user HTML, CSS, and JS, including security policies and scripts for capturing console output and errors.

ctags.name: buildSrcDoc
ctags.pattern: /^export function buildSrcDoc({ html, css, js, channelId }) {$/
